column1: If you want to add custom parameters to products. Please see a tooltip.
column2: If you want to add custom parameters to products. Please see a tooltip.

column1:
Example: pcat=pcat|pbrand=brand
As you can see the format is simple
param1=attribute1|param2=attribute2
Pinterest Pixel parameter and Magento product attribute are connected by = sign and pairs are separated by | sign.
column2:
Example: pcat=pcat|pbrand=brand
As you can see the format is simple
param1=attribute1|param2=attribute2
Pinterest Pixel parameter and Magento product attribute are connected by = sign and pairs are separated by | sign.
